com.scalar.dl.ledger.function

Class StringBasedFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.dl.ledger.function.StringBasedFunction

  • public abstract class StringBasedFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    A base function using the internal String representation as it is for the invoke method arguments, and invoke method return type. You can create your functions based on it. It is recommended to use JacksonBasedFunction in most cases, but you can use this class to achieve faster and more efficient function execution by avoiding JSON serialization and deserialization.

      • invoke

        @Nullable
public abstract T invoke(Database<G,S,P,D,R> database,
                                   @Nullable
                                   T functionArgument,
                                   T contractArgument,
                                   @Nullable
                                   T contractProperties)
        Invokes the function to Database with the specified argument and the corresponding root contract argument and properties. An implementation of the FunctionBase should throw ContractContextException if it faces application-level contextual error (such as lack of balance in payment application).
        Parameters:
        database - mutable database
        functionArgument - function argument
        contractArgument - the argument of the corresponding root contract
        contractProperties - the pre-registered properties of the corresponding root contract
